Name: Statuette of Amun
Description: Amun is represented sitting, with his right clenched fist resting on the lap and the right bent arm raised above the knees; an attribute the god had originally held in the left hand is lost. He wears a short kilt, broad collar, high feather crown and pleated beard. The eyes are inlayed with gold. A line of hieroglyphic inscription is placed on the front and proper right side of the base.
